snippet: About 10 cars were damaged, most of them in the hours before dawn. Police and fire officials said the investigation was continuing, and no motive had been established.
abstract: Several vehicles are set on fire on a stretch of quiet blocks in Harlem in the darkness of early morning; New York City police and fire officials are investigating but no motive for the attack has yet been established.
lead_paragraph: About 10 cars were damaged, most of them in the hours before dawn. Police and fire officials said the investigation was continuing, and no motive had been established.

headline.seo: Cars Set Afire on Several Harlem Streets
headline.main: A Mystery in Harlem as Several Vehicles Are Set on Fire
headline.print_headline: A Mystery in Harlem as Several Vehicles Are Set on Fire
